name: Refrigerator Midea MDRB424FGF01OH White
origAbout: The new range of refrigerators, "Nature Collection" by virtue of the eco-friendly characteristics of all the appliances, boasts A++ and A+ energy classes, Total No Frost technology, interiors specially designed with advanced materials able to protect food from the effects of harmful bacteria. The design has been deliberately designed to make your kitchen even more elegant, thanks to stainless steel anti-fingerprint finishes, elegant external handles and front displays that guarantee both the monitoring and the temperature setting of the refrigerator and freezer compartments.

details.name: Refrigerator Cooling System თანამბრად ანაწილებს ჰაერის ნაკადს მაცივარ კამერაში.
